name: Pop Up
overview: A game based on the board game Perfection where you put shapes into the shapes box as quickly as you can, before the time runs out or else POP!!. Play solo and see how quickly you can place all the shapes, or challenge friends and family by taking turns to see how long it takes you to place the shapes. There are three different levels of difficulty, 9 shapes, 25 shapes and 72 shapes. There are 3 different timers with A being longest and C shortest.
